column14: The Coal Authority are a stautory consultee, and applications for development are required to be submitted with a risk assesssment.

To ensure development does not increase risk to human life from any accidents on major hazard sites. HSE is a statutory consultee for planning applications around major hazard sites and major accident hazard pipelines. HSE sets a consultation distance around the major hazard site or major accident hazard pipeline, within which a planning authority must consult HSE over relevant developments which are likely to lead to an increased population around the major hazard- assume this would be in the form of a buffer on a map?
An area of special architectural or historic interest with a character or appearance that must be preserved or enhanced
